languages.text: "Кажется, город ксеносов свел меня с ума, но... Стоит оставить предательницу в руках собратьев. Она не заслуживает приговора от человеческих рук — смерти быстрой и чистой. Пусть мучается так долго, насколько это возможно".

"I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."
languages.original_text: "Кажется, город ксеносов свел меня с ума, но... Стоит оставить предательницу в руках собратьев. Она не заслуживает приговора от человеческих рук — смерти быстрой и чистой. Пусть мучается так долго, насколько это возможно".

traits.locale_text: "I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being— that death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

"I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being— that death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

"I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

"I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

"I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

"I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

languages.text: “可能是这座异形的城市把我逼疯了，不过……我们真的应该把这个叛徒留给她那些兄弟们。她不该被人类判处死刑，这样的刑罚对她而言太仁慈、太痛快了。让她受苦吧，看看她还能坚持多久。”
languages.original_text: "I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

traits.locale_text: “可能是这座异形的城市把我逼疯了，不过……我们真的应该把这个叛徒留给她那些兄弟们。她不该被人类判处死刑，这样的刑罚对她而言太仁慈、太痛快了。让她受苦吧，看看她还能坚持多久。”

languages.text: «Debo de haber enloquecido aquí, en esta ciudad xenos, pero... es mejor dejar a la traidora en manos de su pueblo. No merece que la sentencie un ser humano: sería una muerte demasiado rápida y limpia para ella. Que sufra tanto como aguante su cuerpo».
languages.original_text: "I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

traits.locale_text: «Debo de haber enloquecido aquí, en esta ciudad xenos, pero... es mejor dejar a la traidora en manos de su pueblo. No merece que la sentencie un ser humano: sería una muerte demasiado rápida y limpia para ella. Que sufra tanto como aguante su cuerpo».

languages.text: « Peut-être que ce temps passé dans cette ville xénos m'a rendu fou, mais... je crois que nous devrions laisser cette traîtresse aux mains de ses pairs. Elle ne mérite pas d'être condamnée par un être humain. Une telle mort serait trop rapide et insuffisamment douloureuse. Laissons-la souffrir le plus longtemps possible. »
languages.original_text: "I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être que ce temps passé dans cette ville xénos m'a rendu fou, mais... je crois que nous devrions laisser cette traîtresse aux mains de ses pairs. Elle ne mérite pas d'être condamnée par un être humain. Une telle mort serait trop rapide et insuffisamment douloureuse. Laissons-la souffrir le plus longtemps possible. »

languages.text: 「この異種族の都市で過ごした時間で、私は正気を失ってしまったのかもしれません…ですが、裏切り者は同族の手に委ねるべきです。彼女は人間に裁かれるに値しません。そんな死は早すぎるし、清潔すぎます。できる限り長く苦しませるのがふさわしい」
languages.original_text: "I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

traits.locale_text: 「この異種族の都市で過ごした時間で、私は正気を失ってしまったのかもしれません…ですが、裏切り者は同族の手に委ねるべきです。彼女は人間に裁かれるに値しません。そんな死は早すぎるし、清潔すぎます。できる限り長く苦しませるのがふさわしい」

languages.text: "Bu zeno şehrinde geçirdiğim zamanda delirmiş olmalıyım ama... Haini kendi türünün ellerine bırakmalıyız. Bir insan tarafından yargılanmayı hak etmiyor. Böyle bir ölüm onun için çok hızlı ve temiz olurdu. Ne kadar dayanırsa o kadar acı çeksin."
languages.original_text: "I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

traits.locale_text: "Bu zeno şehrinde geçirdiğim zamanda delirmiş olmalıyım ama... Haini kendi türünün ellerine bırakmalıyız. Bir insan tarafından yargılanmayı hak etmiyor. Böyle bir ölüm onun için çok hızlı ve temiz olurdu. Ne kadar dayanırsa o kadar acı çeksin."

languages.text: "Die Zeit in der Xenos-Stadt muss mich wahnsinnig gemacht haben, aber ... wir sollten die Verräterin in der Hand der Ihren lassen. Sie hat es nicht verdient, von einem Menschen verurteilt zu werden – dieser Tod wäre zu schnell und sauber für sie. Lasst sie leiden, solange sie es aushält."
languages.original_text: "I must have gone insane from my time in this xenos city, but... we should leave the traitor in the hands of her brethren. She does not deserve to be sentenced by a human being — such a death would be too swift and clean for her. Let her suffer for as long as she may last."

traits.locale_text: "Die Zeit in der Xenos-Stadt muss mich wahnsinnig gemacht haben, aber ... wir sollten die Verräterin in der Hand der Ihren lassen. Sie hat es nicht verdient, von einem Menschen verurteilt zu werden – dieser Tod wäre zu schnell und sauber für sie. Lasst sie leiden, solange sie es aushält."
